entity.nodeQuery: MATCH (n:Entity) RETURN id(n) AS id, labels(n) AS labels
entity.relationshipQuery: MATCH (a:Entity)-[r:RELATED]->(b:Entity) RETURN id(a) AS source, id(b) AS target, coalesce(r.weight, 1.0) AS weight
entity.description: 实体-实体关系图，用于 PageRank/社区检测/Node2Vec

doc_entity.nodeQuery: MATCH (n:Doc) RETURN id(n) AS id, labels(n) AS labels UNION MATCH (n:Entity) RETURN id(n) AS id, labels(n) AS labels
doc_entity.relationshipQuery: MATCH (d:Doc)<-[:PART_OF]-(c:Chunk)-[:MENTIONS]->(e:Entity) RETURN id(d) AS source, id(e) AS target, 1.0 AS weight
doc_entity.description: 文档-实体双模图，可用于 Node2Vec 或双向推荐
